resources.string:
Hello, my name is Amir. 

 At the moment I am a student of Astana IT University. 
I am 18 years old, from Taraz. I studied at a rural school. 
To tell the truth, earlier I was not interested in IT, and I made my choice to enter this specialty and university only in the 11th grade. But I am going to become a highly qualified specialist in the field of programming. I set myself a goal and I will definitely achieve it! 

 In fact, I have a lot of hobbies. From early childhood, I started going to different sections. And by this age I have visited many different sports, thanks to which I also visited many cities and met many interesting people, some of whom became very good friends. I went to sections such as taekwondo, swimming, chess and basketball. Basketball is my favorite. 

 Most of all I enjoy music, I love listening to music. \Also my not-so-good side is that if I start playing or watching a movie/series itâ€™s hard for me to stop. 

Thanks for reading!
